content: This link will be valid until

comment.text: "This translation key is used to display a message indicating when a link's validity expires. It will appear in the UI as an expiration date prompt or confirmation message. For translators, it should describe the action of linking a valid time frame for a digital asset."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'سيكون الرابط صالح لغاية' is a literal translation, but not the most natural or idiomatic way to express 'This link will be valid until' in Arabic (Saudi Arabia). A more natural phrasing would convey a sense of expiration.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'ينتهي صلاحية الرابط بتاريخ' (Yanتهي Salahiyat al-rabit be-tarikh) - 'The link's validity expires on date' or 'سريان الرابط حتى' (Sariyan al-rabit hattan) - 'The link's validity until'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Bu keçid vaxta qədər etibarlı olacaq" is a literal translation and lacks nuance. A more natural-sounding translation would be "Bu linkin keçərliyi vaxta qədər davam edəcək" or "Bu link vaxta qədər işlək olacaq". The phrase 'vaxta qədər etibarlı olacaq' feels slightly awkward in Azerbaijani.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bu linkin keçərliyi vaxta qədər davam edəcək

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Finnish translation "Tämä linkki on voimassa" while technically correct, doesn't fully convey the meaning of "This link will be valid until." It implies validity but lacks the temporal aspect ('until'). A more accurate translation would include a time reference.

The translation "Այս հղումը կգործի մինչև" is a literal translation of "This link will work until." A more accurate and natural translation of 'This link will be valid until' would be "Այս հղումը կգործունե մինչև" or "Այս հղումը վավերական կլինի մինչև".

The translation 'このリンクは次の期間まで有効です：' is a bit too formal and literal for a user-facing message. While technically correct, it doesn't flow naturally. '有効です' (yuukou desu) is a very formal way to say 'valid'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more conversational translation such as: 'このリンクは[Date/Time]まで利用可能です：' or 'このリンクは[Date/Time]まで有効期限です：' depending on the desired tone.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Korean translation "이 링크의 유효 기간:" (i link-ui yuhyo gigan:) literally translates to 'This link's validity period:'. While understandable, a more natural and user-friendly translation would be closer to 'Link valid until:' or 'Validity of this link:'. The colon feels a bit abrupt and formal in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider '링크 유효 기간:' (link yuhyo gigan:) or '이 링크는 다음까지 유효합니다:' (i link-neun daeum-kkaji yuhyo-hamnida:), which conveys the same meaning with a more conversational tone.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Sinhala translation 'සබැඳිය වලංගු කාලය:' is more literally "Link valid time:" rather than "This link will be valid until". While understandable, it's a less natural and less user-friendly phrasing in Sinhala. It reads more like a label than a complete sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing like "සබැඳිය වලංගු වන්නේ" (Sabaṇdiya valaṅguvanne) which translates to "This link will be valid until" or "සබැඳිය අවසන් වන තෙක්" (Sabaṇdiya avasān vana tek) which translates to "This link will be valid until...".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Turkish translation 'Bu bağlantı şu tarihe kadar geçerli olacaktır:' is a bit formal and verbose for a simple notification. A more natural and concise phrasing would be preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bu bağlantı belirli bir tarihe kadar geçerli.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Це посилання діятиме до" is too literal and doesn't flow naturally in Ukrainian. A more idiomatic translation would convey the meaning of 'valid until'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Розгляньте варіант: 'Цей посилання буде дійсним до' or 'Термін дії цього посилання закінчується' or 'Це посилання буде активним до'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Liên kết này sẽ có hiệu lực đến" is a literal translation and while understandable, it's not the most natural phrasing in Vietnamese for this context. It implies the link will *become* valid until a certain point, rather than simply being valid until then.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Liên kết này có hiệu lực đến
